name: Bunny Blast
description:
Blast bubbles by matching colors! Get five matching bubbles adjacent and they will explode. You can also launch bombs, which destroy nearby blocks.

Cover Art by: https://twitter.com/ScarletDrawsArt

Move left and right - Arrow keys or A/D
Aim up and down - Arrow keys or W/S
Vacuum up Bubbles - Z, left Control, Shift, <, or left mouse
Shoot out Bubbles - X, enter, >, or right mouse
Jump - Space 

Less Bubbles = More time to survive! If the screen fills, you lose!
